member.name: T:ExternalServer.IoC
member.summary: Class that provides access to the autofac dependency container.

member.name: M:ExternalServer.IoC.Init
member.summary: Registers all types to a internal containerbuilder. Does not build the cointainer yet.

member.name: M:ExternalServer.IoC.RegisterToContainerBuilder(Autofac.ContainerBuilder@)
member.summary: Also needed to register all types to an external container builder. Used in GardeningSystem.RestAPI -> Startup

member.name: T:ExternalServer.Program
member.summary: Class containing the starting point of the application.
